Product Features

Grey, short sleeve, cotton T-shirt, modern design, with logo for 100 years of AGH UST. Sleeves rolled up twice, back of T-shirt sewn vertically, on the back (inside) there is a sew-on badge with words “100 LAT AGH”.  
Details such as satin label with jubilee logo, sweatband ribbon in university colours, and printed design on the front make it unique. Made of high quality fabric. Made in Poland. Available in men’s and women’s styles. Sizes smaller than normal. We recommend buying the T-shirt one size larger than usually.  

Product description  
size: women’s, fitted waist (from S to XL), men’s (from S to XXL)  
type: T-shirt  
colour: grey  
type of print: silk-screen printing  
colour of print: white  
fabric: 100% cotton  
basic weight of fabric: 130 gsm
